actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that monthly social security benefit payments and annuity and pension payments under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall not be included as income for the purpose of determining eligibility for, and the amount of, veterans' or widows' pensions, and parents' compensation.

summary.text: Provides that monthly social security benefit payments and annuity and pension payments under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall not be included as income for the purpose of determining eligibility for, and the amount of, veterans' or widows' pensions, and parents' compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide that monthly social security benefit payments and annuity and pension payments under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall not be included as income for the purpose of determining eligibility for, and the amount of, veterans' or widows' pensions, and parents' compensation.
